title: reniloml
author: reniloml
content: Hey everyone!I'm trying to get some initial feedback on a new project I'm working on. The concept is simple, revolutionise the way real estate development projects in the UK are funded.By harnessing blockchain protocols we allow our web3 community to fund the development of real-world assets all through our self-serve platform; moving away from reliance on traditional institutions, we give the power of lucrative development financing to the people.I know this is a very brief and simple description so if you'd like me to share more details alongside our website and whitepaper feel free to drop a comment below.I would really appreciate it âš¡Thank you in advance for your time

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Quote from: reniloml on April 05, 2023, 10:20:48 AMBy harnessing blockchain protocols we allow our web3 community to fund the development of real-world assets all through our self-serve platform; moving away from reliance on traditional institutions, we give the power of lucrative development financing to the people.initial feedback are always about an implemented project, not a discussion of ideas, especially if the ideas are general and ambitious, such as real estate development in one of the largest economies in the world, or general terms such as blockchain protocols.Many ideas did not succeed in linking cryptocurrencies with real reality, but they succeeded as methods of bank transfers, or let me be kind, the blockchain as a useless technology and was not applied in a way that achieves economic benefit except in Bitcoin and a few digital currencies.Attempting to develop new systems on the blockchain is questionable compared to the available technology (in terms of speed, cost.)
